org.opengis.cite.owc10.atom

Class AtomCoreTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.owc10.CommonFixture
      • org.opengis.cite.owc10.atom.AtomCoreTests

  • public class AtomCoreTests
extends CommonFixture
    Defines test methods that apply to an Atom (RFC 4287) representation of a context document in accord with OGC OWS Context Atom Encoding Standard 1.0 (OGC 12-084r2).

    Sources

    • OGC 12-084r2: OGC OWS Context Atom Encoding Standard, Version 1.0
    • The Atom Syndication Format (RFC 4287)

    • Method Detail

      • initFixture

        public void initFixture(ITestContext testContext)

      • isAtomFeed

        public void isAtomFeed()
        [Test] The atom:feed element shall be used in OWS Context to describe the context file.

      • assessSchemaValidity

        public void assessSchemaValidity()
                          throws SAXException,
                                 IOException
        [Test] The Atom feed is schema-valid. Note that the (informative) RELAX NG grammar given in Appendix B of RFC 4287 accepts either a feed or an entry as the starting element.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs while attempting to read a schema grammar or the context file.
        SAXException - If the context file cannot be parsed.
        See Also:
        RELAX NG Compact Syntax Grammar for OGC Context Atom Encoding

      • checkSchematronRules

        public void checkSchematronRules()
        [Test] Checks that Schematron constraints are satisfied. Several general rules are embedded in the RELAX NG grammars; these have been extracted into a separate schema (owc-atom.sch).
        See Also:
        RELAX NG Compact Syntax Grammar for OGC Context Atom Encoding, RFC 4287, Appendix B: RELAX NG Compact Schema
